mapper.select:
select b_no ,r.resume_no ,p.p_no ,p.name ,p.phone ,p.addr ,c.career1 ,c.career2 ,c.career3 ,c.career4 ,c.career5 ,l.license_name1 ,l.license_name2 ,l.license_name3 ,l.license_name4 ,l.license_name5 ,t.subject ,t.pwd ,t.hope_work ,t.start_time ,t.end_time ,t.content ,to_char(t.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" ,to_char(t.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') as "end_date" ,to_char(t.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "reg_date"
from person_mem p , part_time t , career c, person_license l , resume r where t.b_no=#{t.b_no} and t.p_no=p.p_no and p.p_no= r.p_no and r.resume_no=c.resume_no and r.resume_no=l.resume_no

select count(*) from ( select b_no ,p.p_no ,p.name ,p.phone ,p.addr ,t.subject ,t.hope_work ,t.start_time ,t.end_time ,to_char(t.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" ,to_char(t.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') as "end_date" ,to_char(t.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "reg_date"
from person_mem p , part_time t where p.p_no=t.p_no
and to_number(to_char(t.end_date,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))>0 and
to_number(to_char(t.start_date,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))<0
and ( upper(name) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(phone) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(subject) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(addr) like upper('%${keyword}%') )
and( upper(addr) like upper('%${work_place}%') )
order by b_no desc
order by ${sort}
)
select count(*) from part_time where b_no=#{b_no}
select count(*) from part_time where b_no=#{b_no} and pwd=#{pwd}
